arts.ttl: 5 reasons Bayern will win Der Klassiker against Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Their ability to remain so dominant away from the Allianz Arena will hold them in good stead when they visit the Signal Iduna Park, especially given Dortmund ’s home form that has seen them go unbeaten at home in 11 games in all competitions. Their ability to find the back of the net is not the only reason Bayern are sitting atop the Bundesliga table right now; they also have the best defensive record in the league, with just seven goals conceded in their first 11 matches.

arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. PSG; Manchester United sensing defeat with Alphonso Davies; Joshua Kimmich close to contract extension?; Manchester City eyeing Jeremie Frimpong; and MORE!
arts.sum: PSG started the second half with a real sense of urgency as Bayern Munich looked like it was reeling. This was the same way he looked during the EUROs. That jump that he had in his to start the season for Bayern Munich is gone.

However, these two clubs aren’t the only ones interested in the 27-year-old. arts.ttl: Leon Goretzka getting chance to show Bayern Munich staff he belongs
arts.sum: Of course I’m happy when that’s acknowledged. Bayern munich midfielder Leon Goretzka has not had the easiest of seasons.

arts.ttl: Marquinhos says PSG was victim in loss to Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain dropped a 1-0 decision to Bayern Munich and Marquinhos thinks it had a whole lot to do with the treatment that the French club received from the referee. Regardless, Bayern Munich picked up the win and PSG can only lament what might have been.

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany says Bayern Munich wasn’t fooled by PSG’s bag of tricks
arts.sum: Bayern Munich coach Vincent Kompany downplayed his team’s need for a big, signature win in the pregame press conference prior to the German giant’s 1-0 victory over Paris Saint-Germain in the Champions League . Hopefully it will look good when we win a few more games.
